snippet: On Sundays, Ramon A. Dominguez, a jockey who won the 2011 Breeders’ Cup, often rides several races. But though he buys doughnuts for the grooms and workers in the barns when he wins, he won’t indulge.
abstract: Ramon A Dominguez, award winning jockey with a gift for bringing the best out of horses, describes his typical Sunday routine.
lead_paragraph: On Sundays, Ramon A. Dominguez, a jockey who won the 2011 Breeders’ Cup, often rides several races. But though he buys doughnuts for the grooms and workers in the barns when he wins, he won’t indulge.

headline.print_headline: Race to Win, but No Doughnuts
headline.seo: On Sundays, Ramon A. Dominguez Races to Win, but Avoids Doughnuts
headline.main: Race to Win, but No Doughnuts
